hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1613 B and today's date is July
11th 2018 and the title of the episode
is Trump and Putin's meeting will seal
the deal which pushes the plan forward
let's get into the economic collapse
political and geopolitical news now
yesterday we talked about struck and
lisa page and lisa page was supposed to
testify behind closed doors with the
House Judiciary Committee and it looks
like Lisa page plans to blatantly defy a

appear for her deposition and Goodlatte
is out there saying that it appears key
witness lisa page has something to hide
and congress will use all tools at their
disposal to obtain her testimony and we
see right now that lisa pages lawyer is
out there saying that she didn't receive
the documents they didn't receive the
documents that were supposed to be given
to us and we weren't able to review them
and Jeffreys who is lisa pages lawyer
said the committee's have not honored
this request as a result lisa is not
going to appear for an interview at this
time however the freedom caucus chairman
mark meadows tweeted that page and her
attorneys did review the requested
documents at the FBI on tuesday and that
her failure to appear before Congress
this morning had eluded had little to do
with preparation and everything to do
with avoiding accountability so we
already see right now that she's not
going to testify and they're gonna take
the appropriate actions and again these
individuals they know what is happening
here and they realize that they are
stuck we see the federal judge has now
delayed the sentencing for Michael Flynn
once again now yesterday we thought the
judge said no more delays no more of
anything but it looks like the federal
judge has delayed the sentencing now we
know that Huma Abedin and Anthony Weiner
they're in the center of the Clinton
email scandal and everything else and I
don't believe in coincidences I don't
believe like ooh this just happened to
happen what's very interesting about all
this in Anthony Weiner's and Huma Abedin
apartment complex in Manhattan in the
trash compactor they found a dead body
now this is in their building they both
own this apartment in this building and
the police were called there the female
is unidentified and was discovered
inside the trash compactor of the
Manhattan apartment complex that human a
burden and convicted pedophile Anthony
Weiner have used as a base for the last
16 years who is this person we don't
know why is this person there we don't
know but again don't you find it odd
that this individual is in their
building in a trash compactor very odd
and things are getting stranger and
stranger as we move forward
we see there are certain GOP members of
Congress they're taking matters into
their own hands and because of all these
different violent attacks by these
masked individuals which is an Tifa they
decided to create a bill where it says
the following and that the bill is
called the unmasking and Tifa act of
2018 whoever whether or not acting under
color of law while in disguise including
while wearing a mask injures oppresses
threatens or intimidates any person in
any state territory Commonwealth
possession or district in the free
exercise or enjoyment of any right or
privilege secured to him by the
Constitution or laws of the United
States or because of his having so
exercised the same shall be fined under
this title imprison not no more than 15
years or both well you are allowed to go
around with a mask on the thing you
cannot do is hurt someone threaten
people
and things like that we already have
laws for that and again what they're
trying to do is they're trying to stop
an Tifa because they're a very violent
group they destroy property they wear
masks so nobody can identify them and we
know that this is all part of the deep
state plan to push riots to push Anarchy
all throughout the country they're using
this group but it has not worked
we know that the judge has given the
Trump administration a timeline to
reunite children with their parents and
of course once you do this this is going
to fail because there's no gray area in
this first of all how do you know that
these are the parents of the children
and what's very interesting is that the
Department of Homeland Security and
Department of Health and Human Services
they held a joint call Tuesday to
announce their efforts to comply with
the June 26 federal court ruling
mandating children under five years old
in HHS custody be reunited with parents
if they were separated at the border and
of course this ruling came from US
District Judge Dana sebuah in response
to the American Civil Liberties Union
lawsuit which was on July 10th and that
was the deadline the problem here is
that they don't know if these adults are
the parents of these children so the
joint status report notes that in at
least 14 of the 102 children cases they
will not be uniting them with parents
because the adults in question are
either not actually their parents have
been convicted of a serious crime
including rape and murder or have
incredibly accused of child abuse the
government will not place children with
adults without completing these checks
HHS chief staff Chris Meekins went on to
explain that three parents admitted they
were not actually related to the
children with whom they were ordered to
be reunited when agents brought out DNA
swabs to test the parentage
two others were proven not to be the
parents when DNA tests were completed
eight other purported parents will not
be reunited with the children due to
failed criminal background checks that
turned up serious convictions or child
abuse and they're saying that they can't
comply with this law because some of
them well these are not their parents
the other ones are criminals and they
just can't do it but the judge is saying
you have to do it which is absolutely
ridiculous and of course this ruling was
set up to fail from the beginning we see
NATO secretary-general agreed on
Wednesday that trumps call for other
members to boost their defence spending
under the military alliance is having an
effect and other members are going to
boost the amount that they push into
NATO and again do we really need NATO
today most likely not Russia is not a
threat this was created out of thin air
NATO was created to combat Russia and
right now Russia once again is a made up

first batch of s400 systems in 2019 and
it looks like turkey is going along with

military equipment Assad's regime they
have widened their assault in the

Qaeda the paid mercenaries and the rest
and rebels right now they have
surrendered in the southern districts of

they've captured these areas they are
uncovering UK made weapons along borders

the rebels but we know that the rebels
the Islamic state al Qaeda they're all
one in the same group
and now they're finding that all these
weapons are turning up with the Islamic
state or al-nusra or al-qaeda and once
again we see that this was being pushed
by who the Obama administration under
the timber Sycamore plan
this was the covert CIA program which
was established during the Obama
administration to arm Syrian rebels
locked in a protracted civil war against
Assad regime and at least 500 tow
missiles were reportedly transferred
through Saudi Arabia to the Free Syrian
Army in late 2015 and in February 2016 a

Neph notice that a javelin anti-tank

YPG forces now again this weapon was not

moderate rebels but again all these
different areas were all one in the same
and they were just passing the weapons
back and forth and I remember in July
Trump moved to end the timber sycamore
plan that Obama created and that was
stopped
we know that the funding to the Kurdish
group was also stopped they were funding
the military because they were trying to
separate Syria the training and the
payment towards the moderate rebels that
was discontinued and we see that things
are changing dramatically everything's

be sealed and what this means is
Netanyahu is going to say listen we need

is confirmed
Netanyahu's going to speak to Trump and
have the sanctions removed from Russia
and I believe this is part of
the plan which is in the beginning

Syria because what do they want to do
they want to show that Iran now is no
longer a threat in Syria no longer a

there's no reason to keep the forces
there and I do believe that Putin is

he's gonna say since the terrorist
groups have been eliminated in Syria
there's no reason to have foreign troops
in Syria and he's most likely going to
ask Iran to now pack up and leave and

and then they're gonna say okay they
have left now it is your turn the u.s.
to leave this area and I believe this is
how it's going to play out and we're
going to see the troops removed from
this area now this is just one part of
the plan this is the beginning stages of
what is happening out in the Middle East
there's gonna be a lot more coming down
the line and we can see right now this
is something that deep State does not
want they spent many many years having
regime change trying to remove Assad
trying to do all this and everything is

it is going to be taken away as time

things are about to change yes there is
a possibility that the deep state could
do something maybe they'll try another

in Syria where they can say hey it was

why would he use chemical weapons on his
own people at this point it makes no

he used him at all it doesn't why the
people for Assad if he's using chemical

come back to Syria millions and millions
of people they wouldn't they would stay

afraid of the dictator Assad they
wouldn't come
but they are they're all coming back

they understand what is going on
they understand who's doing what and it
